author: Simon Rice
title: Leaked Chelsea 2017/18 home, away and third kits likely to divide opinion – pictures
text:
Chelsea will be switching kit maker next season (Getty) Chelsea ’s purported kits for the 2017/18 season have been leaked online.
Images of the home, away and third strips that will allegedly be worn by Antonio Conte’s side next season emerged last night.
Shameful stat sums up how feeble Arsenal have been this season It’s unclear if they are the real deal, but if they are it seems likely they will divide opinion among supporters.
Next season’s strip is certain to undergo a major overhaul from the current design whether the leak is genuine or not. Chelsea are switching kit maker for next season, having announced a deal with Nike, who will replace Adidas.
The leaked design shows a diamond pattern across all three kits. Chelsea will wear their traditional blue at home, white away and a black and orange third strip when necessary.
